title.value: Correction to: Multi-agent reinforcement learning for fast-timescale demand response of residential loads
title.justification: The title of the paper is clearly mentioned at the beginning of the document.
title.quote: Correction to: Multi-agent reinforcement learning for fast-timescale demand response of residential loads

extractions.description: This paper is a correction notice for the original article about multi-agent reinforcement learning applied to fast-timescale demand response of residential loads. The correction addresses multiple instances of incorrect in-text reference formats in the original article.

type.justification: The original article appears to be based on applied methods and empirical results in the field of multi-agent reinforcement learning and demand response, thus falling under empirical study.
type.quote: The original article has been corrected.

name.justification: The original article focuses on multi-agent reinforcement learning applied to fast-timescale demand response.
name.quote: Multi-agent reinforcement learning for fast-timescale demand response of residential loads

name.justification: The sub-field specifically addresses the application of reinforcement learning in the domain of demand response for residential loads.
name.quote: Multi-agent reinforcement learning for fast-timescale demand response of residential loads
